name: Color Buddies
description:
CONTROLS

Game 1

  • Left / Right arrow keys - Move left and right
  • Space - Jump (you can double jump)

Game 2

  • Left / Right arrow keys - Move left and right
  • Space - Jump
  • Up arrow - Go through door
  • Down arrow - Attack

Game 3

  • Left / Right arrow keys - Move left and right
  • Space - Jump
